divs: sighting detailsmy wife & i were going to bed and she is always in front of me walking down the hall, i stopped at a window and looked out and seen this huge air ship with a string of lights( not flashing) and flying very low, i holler at my wife, come here! when she got back to the window with the first one still in view, here came another one in the exact same path. they had no sound and were moving very slow and low and they turned slighty left, heading southwest and our vision was soon cut off, due to trees. i am not sure about the exact year this happen, but i am within a few years. it was at bed time and dark. there were more things happen after that( few years later) but i don't have time to write all this down. *(wit's name deleted -- sgonzalez\cms)
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Athens
There were no other sightings in Athens on or around September 20th 1988
Summary: My wife & I were retiring to bed when I looked out the window and seen one large object (flying low), following was another one. NO SOUND.
